okta.organizationUrl: [The url of your Okta organization, such https://company.okta.com
okta.clientId: [The Client ID value in the General->Client Credentials section of your OpenID Connect application as obtained from the Okta admin dashboard, e.g. koKWeLLKa6WmBQJ5mYUR]
okta.authorizationServerIssuer: [The url of your 'ToDo List API' Okta Authorization Server from the Security->API page of the Okta admin dashboard]
okta.audience: [The audience of your 'ToDo List API' Okta Authorization Server]
